history.proof: intros x. unfold quotient_projection. simpl. unfold equiv_class. apply Singleton_inv. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros x. unfold quotient_projection. simpl. unfold equiv_class. unfold proj1_sig. apply FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality. intro y. unfold equiv_class. unfold In. apply prop_ext. split. + intro H. apply (R_impl_equality_of_equiv_class x y H). + intro H. apply (equality_of_equiv_class_impl_R x y H).
